name: Hilton Garden Inn Florence Novoli

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This was almost my favorite hotel in Rome. The amenities were excellent. The location is a little way out but you can get bus tickets for 1Euro at the front desk to get into town.
reviews.title: Loved this hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel was clean, Staff - well they got me a same day reservation into the museums - wonder of wonder. Food was good.. Ok I really enjoyed it, as a matter of fact I enjoyed it so much I stayed 3 days in stead of 1.
reviews.title: Pretty good hotel but a little far from the attractions

reviews.text: This area is building up with I think the court of justice is being built next to it and let me tell you soon it wont be as cheap as it is.
reviews.title: Stay here while the rate is still low

reviews.text: BTW - did I mention the dial up beds - the most comfortable of all I stayed in in Italy.
reviews.title: Fabulous way to spend the night before an early flight home

likes.liked: — airport proximity, clean, lovely design elements
likes.disliked: — in a new part of town near contstruction - views not nice

reviews.text: YOu will really enjoy this hotel - first class.
reviews.title: Nice Hotel, Okay location, Beware the Luggage Racks!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed here only one night on our last day in Italy.
reviews.title: Excellent value for business travellers

likes.liked: — Its close location to the airport, spacious bathroom and convenient facilities.
likes.disliked: — Not exactly least like. Simply I thought it was a good value BUSINESS hotel.

reviews.text: We chose this hotel because it's a stone's throw away from the airport of Florence. We had to catch a morning flight, so we wanted to be close from the airport to avoid the rush.
reviews.title: Excellent service and affordable rates

likes.liked: — hospitality and friendliness of hotel staff

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We found this hotel refreshing, maybe because it was strikingly different from the houses where we stayed for the previous two weeks.
reviews.title: Our worst hotel of the week

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel is full of up-to-date gadgets you can expect from a business hotel in US, and offers convenient facilities such as 24/7 free internet and business center, and self-service pantry shop.
reviews.title: Terrific Staff, Gorgeous Property

reviews.text: Everything is shiny and bright. Modern and tasteful decoration. The staffs were kind and efficient, and the room and the bathroom SPACIOUS.
reviews.title: Great Hotel

reviews.text: This hotel is modern, but not bleak like most modern decor hotel rooms. Rooms had some warmth to it and furnished nicely. Nice bathroom about the size of the US hotel bathrooms. (not small like European bathrooms) Good breakfast. A real plus to have free wifi (internet). The room was decent size, Very clean. Nice amenities. Only negetative was finding it using hotel's directions. Spent 3 + hours trying to find the hotel per their directions. Also not near the historical district but we were able to get a bus about 3 min. from hotel. Bus took about 10 to 15 min. to get to train station and bus was very easy to use both coming and going. I would definitely recommend this hotel
reviews.title: Enjoyed our stay

reviews.text: I have been several times at the Hilton garden Inn Novoli now and with pleasure. It is the ideal business-hotel in Florence and this at reasonable rates. It is new (sinc Oct 2006), modern, light. clean, and extremely friendly staffed.
reviews.title: The ideal modern business-hotel in Florence (Novoli/Rifredi)

likes.disliked: — It is not in or very near to the center of town

aka: Hilton Garden Inn Florence Novoli Hotel
